product_overview: A modern multilingual business website built with Next.js and React that delivers dynamic SEO, user-friendly navigation, and seamless contact integration to support global customers.
core_goals: Provide seamless internationalization with language-specific routing to serve content in multiple languages.
Implement dynamic SEO features including sitemap and robots.txt generation to improve search engine visibility.
Enable user communication via a secure and rate-limited contact form integrated with an email API.
Offer an engaging and informative homepage with sections such as hero, services overview, testimonials, partner logos, and contact call-to-action.
Present detailed service listings and individual service pages with clear routing and easy navigation.
Ensure legal compliance by including privacy policy and terms and conditions pages.
Maintain consistent UI components and global styling leveraging Tailwind CSS for a cohesive brand experience.
key_features: Internationalization and locale routing middleware enabling multi-language support.
Dynamic sitemap and robots.txt generation for up-to-date SEO configuration.
Contact form API with Resend email integration and rate limiting to prevent abuse.
Main layout including header, footer, language switcher, and analytics tracking container.
Homepage structure featuring hero section, services preview, client testimonials, partner showcases, and contact call-to-action.
Detailed service pages accessible by slugs with keyed utilities managing service data.
Legal pages for privacy policy and terms and conditions available in all supported languages.
UI components such as brand logo and WhatsApp contact button for quick user engagement.
Global styling setup with Tailwind CSS ensuring consistent design throughout the site.
user_flow_summary: User lands on the homepage and selects preferred language from the language switcher.
User navigates through localized pages including services, testimonials, and partner information.
User accesses detailed information about a specific service via service slug URLs.
User fills out the contact form, which sends a message via API integrating with Resend email service, subject to rate limits.
User reviews legal information through dedicated privacy policy and terms pages in their chosen language.
validation_criteria: Internationalization works correctly with all supported locales and webpages load properly per locale routing.
SEO files (sitemap.xml and robots.txt) are generated dynamically and reflect current site structure.
Contact form submission triggers email sending through the Resend API and enforces rate limiting.
All main UI components render correctly including header, footer, and language switcher across devices.
Homepage and services listings load with correct content and localized text.
Legal pages are accessible, correctly translated, and display updated legal information.
Global CSS applies consistently with no style regressions observed across pages and components.
User flows execute without errors including language switching, navigation, service detail access, and form submission.
